name: Balloon FRVR
description:
Are you up for a relaxing and fun challenge that will bring a smile to your face? Try navigating the balloon circle along the barbed wire path and avoiding the spikes. The farther you get without popping the balloon, the higher your score.

Sounds easy, doesn't it?

Be forewarned – it's positively addictive!

Accompanied by adorable graphics, charming sound effects and an upbeat, happy-jazz-style soundtrack, Balloon will keep you coming back for more.

Even losing makes you smile when the adorable bug no longer has a balloon to carry and flies away.

Balloon FRVR Features:
- Choose casual, normal or challenging for each level
- Original music that lifts your mood
- Charming sound effects
- Suitable for all ages
- Sharpen your skills
- Pleasing graphics
- Intuitive one-tap play
